segments.source_content:
---
slug: /sidebar
---
# Sidebar
Creating a sidebar is useful to:

- Group multiple **related documents**
- **Display a sidebar** on each of those documents
- Provide **paginated navigation**, with next/previous button

translations.zh-CN:
- 将多个**相关文档**分组
- 在这些文档的每个页面上**显示侧边栏**
- 提供**分页导航**功能，包含上一页/下一页按钮

segments.source_content: To use sidebars on your Docusaurus site:

translations.zh-CN: 要在 Docusaurus 站点中使用侧边栏：

segments.source_content:
1. Define a file that exports a dictionary of [sidebar objects](#sidebar-object).
2. Pass this object into the `@docusaurus/plugin-docs` plugin directly or via `@docusaurus/preset-classic`.

translations.zh-CN:
1. 定义一个导出[侧边栏对象](#sidebar-object)字典的文件
2. 将该对象直接传递给 `@docusaurus/plugin-docs` 插件或通过 `@docusaurus/preset-classic` 传递

segments.source_content: This section serves as an overview of miscellaneous features of the doc sidebar. In the following sections, we will more systematically introduce the following concepts:

translations.zh-CN: 本节概述了文档侧边栏的杂项功能。后续章节将系统性地介绍以下概念：

segments.source_content: import DocCardList from '@theme/DocCardList';
<DocCardList />
## Default sidebar {#default-sidebar}
If the `sidebarPath` is unspecified, Docusaurus [automatically generates a sidebar](autogenerated.mdx) for you, by using the filesystem structure of the `docs` folder:

translations.zh-CN: 如果未指定 `sidebarPath`，Docusaurus 会基于 `docs` 文件夹的文件系统结构[自动生成侧边栏](autogenerated.mdx)：

segments.source_content: You can also define your sidebars explicitly.

translations.zh-CN: 您也可以显式定义侧边栏。

segments.source_content: ## Sidebar object {#sidebar-object}
A sidebar at its crux is a hierarchy of categories, doc links, and other hyperlinks.

translations.zh-CN: 侧边栏的核心是由分类目录、文档链接和其他超链接组成的层级结构。

segments.source_content: For example:
This is a sidebars file that exports one sidebar, called `mySidebar`. It has three top-level items: two categories and one external link. Within each category, there are a few doc links.

translations.zh-CN: 这是一个导出了名为 `mySidebar` 侧边栏的配置文件。它包含三个顶级项：两个分类目录和一个外部链接。每个分类目录下又有若干文档链接。

segments.source_content: A sidebars file can contain [**multiple sidebar objects**](multiple-sidebars.mdx), identified by their object keys.

translations.zh-CN: 侧边栏配置文件可以包含[**多个侧边栏对象**](multiple-sidebars.mdx)，通过对象键名区分。

segments.source_content: ## Theme configuration {#theme-configuration}
### Hideable sidebar {#hideable-sidebar}

By enabling the `themeConfig.docs.sidebar.hideable` option, you can make the entire sidebar hideable, allowing users to better focus on the content. This is especially useful when content is consumed on medium-sized screens (e.g. tablets).

translations.zh-CN: 启用 `themeConfig.docs.sidebar.hideable` 选项后，整个侧边栏可被隐藏，让用户更专注于内容。这在中等尺寸屏幕（如平板电脑）上特别有用。

segments.source_content: ### Auto-collapse sidebar categories {#auto-collapse-sidebar-categories}

The `themeConfig.docs.sidebar.autoCollapseCategories` option would collapse all sibling categories when expanding one category. This saves the user from having too many categories open and helps them focus on the selected section.

translations.zh-CN: `themeConfig.docs.sidebar.autoCollapseCategories` 选项会在展开某个分类时折叠所有同级分类。这能避免用户同时展开过多分类，帮助其聚焦于当前选中部分。

segments.source_content: ## Passing custom props {#passing-custom-props}

To pass in custom props to a sidebar item, add the optional `customProps` object to any of the items. This is useful to apply site customizations by swizzling React components rendering sidebar items.

translations.zh-CN: 要向侧边栏项传递自定义属性，可在任意项中添加可选的 `customProps` 对象。通过 swizzle 渲染侧边栏项的 React 组件时，这对实现站点定制很有帮助。

segments.source_content: ## Sidebar Breadcrumbs {#sidebar-breadcrumbs}
By default, breadcrumbs are rendered at the top, using the "sidebar path" of the current page.

translations.zh-CN: 默认情况下，页面顶部会基于当前页面的"侧边栏路径"渲染面包屑导航。

segments.source_content: This behavior can be disabled with plugin options:

translations.zh-CN: 可通过插件选项禁用此功能：

segments.source_content: ## Complex sidebars example {#complex-sidebars-example}
A real-world example from the Docusaurus site:

translations.zh-CN: 来自 Docusaurus 站点的真实示例：

segments.source_content: import CodeBlock from '@theme/CodeBlock';

<CodeBlock language="js" title="sidebars.js">
  {require('!!raw-loader!@site/sidebars.ts')
    .default
    .split('\n')
    // remove comments
    .map((line) => !['//','/*','*'].some(commentPattern => line.trim().startsWith(commentPattern)) && line)
    .filter(Boolean)
    .join('\n')}
</CodeBlock>
